name: screen-to-cloudinary
description: A lambda function that takes a screenshot of a URL and uploads it to Cloudinary

scripts.build-lambda-package: npm run prepare-lambda-package && cd dist && zip -rq ../lambda-package.zip . && cd .. && rm -rf dist
scripts.prepare-lambda-package: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && cp package.json dist/package.json && cp -R utils dist/ && cp index.js dist/index.js && cd dist && npm install --production
